battlePlanner.heroSubtitle: The difference between a coordinated castle hit and wasted marches is timing. Get it right ‚Äî every time.
battlePlanner.trialNote: Free for everyone during the trial period. No account required.
battlePlanner.step1Desc: Enter each rally caller with their march times to the target building.
battlePlanner.step2Desc: Select King's Castle or any of the 4 Turrets. Choose simultaneous or staggered hits.
battlePlanner.step3Desc: The planner calculates exact delays. Copy the call order and share it with your alliance.
battlePlanner.featuresSubtitle: Every feature exists because rally callers asked for it.
battlePlanner.featSyncDesc: Calculate exact call delays so every rally lands on the same building within seconds of each other. No more counting on your fingers.
battlePlanner.featBuffDesc: Track active speed buffs per player with live countdown timers. The planner auto-switches between regular and buffed march times.
battlePlanner.featEstimateDesc: Only know one march time? Enter regular or buffed ‚Äî the planner estimates the other using the √ó1.55 ratio. No spreadsheets needed.
battlePlanner.featCounterDesc: Plan offensive and defensive rallies simultaneously. Run two independent queues with different timing strategies.
battlePlanner.featPresetsDesc: Save your entire roster ‚Äî allies and enemies ‚Äî with their march times. Load them instantly for the next battle. Zero repeated setup.
battlePlanner.featCopyDesc: Generate the exact call order and copy it to clipboard. Paste it in your alliance chat. Everyone knows when to march.
battlePlanner.problemTitle: The castle is burning. Your rallies land 30 seconds apart.
battlePlanner.problemDesc: You've got 5 rally callers. Different march times. Someone calls too early, someone too late. The enemy reinforces between hits. Sound familiar?
battlePlanner.solutionDesc: The Battle Planner accounts for the 5-minute rally fill time plus each player's individual march time, then tells you exactly who calls first and the precise delay between each call. Your rallies connect within a 1-second window. The enemy can't reinforce fast enough.
battlePlanner.supporterDesc: The Battle Planner is included with Atlas Supporter ‚Äî along with unlimited /multirally, the Supporter badge, exclusive Discord access, and more. Starting at $4.99/month.
battlePlanner.communityCreditSuffix: for rallying this idea into existence. Built by the community, for the community.

about.transferHubDesc: Tired of asking "anyone know a good kingdom?" in Discord and getting 20 different answers? The
about.heroSubtitle: Know your enemy. Choose your allies. Dominate Kingshot.
about.featureDirectoryDesc: Every kingdom. Every stat. Searchable, filterable, and ranked. Find exactly what you're looking for in seconds.
about.featureScoreDesc: Battle-tested rating that rewards experience and consistency. One number tells you who's a real threat vs a lucky newcomer.
about.featureComparisonDesc: Pit any two kingdoms against each other. See who has the edge in Prep, Battle, and overall dominance.
about.featureHistoryDesc: Every match. Every result. Every streak. Know exactly what you're walking into before the gates open.
about.featureTiersDesc: S-Tier elites to D-Tier underdogs. Instantly identify where any kingdom stands in the pecking order.
about.atlasScoreTitle: The Atlas Score: Your Kingdom's True Power Level
about.tierSystemTitle: The Tier System: Where Does Your Kingdom Rank?
about.builtByPlayer: Built by a Player, For Players
about.transferHubTitle: The Transfer Hub: No More Blind Transfers
about.atlasScoreIntro: Stop guessing. Start winning. The Atlas Score measures what actually matters:
about.atlasScoreIntro2: Our formula rewards experience, punishes lucky streaks, and shows who really dominates. Here's the breakdown:
about.baseScoreDesc: Combined Prep (45%) + Battle (55%) win rates with Bayesian adjustment. No inflated scores from lucky starts.
about.domInvasionDesc: Dominations boost your score up to +15%. Invasions hurt equally. Rewards consistent double-phase performance.
about.recentFormDesc: Last 5 KvKs weighted by recency. Domination=1.0, Comeback=0.80, Reversal=0.70, Invasion=0.
about.streakBonusDesc: Current win streaks provide a boost. Battle: +1.1% per win (max 10). Prep: +1% per win (max 10).
about.bayesianAdjDesc: Pulls extreme rates toward 50% until you prove yourself
about.expScalingDesc: Full credit at 5+ KvKs‚Äîno shortcuts for newcomers
about.multiplierStackDesc: Dominations, form, and streaks compound your base score
about.realData: Real data. Real results. No spin. That's how you know who to fear and who to target.
about.tierSystemDesc: Every kingdom earns their tier through battle. No politics, no favoritism‚Äîjust cold, hard results.
about.originP1b: The founder got tired of making transfer decisions based on rumors and Discord hearsay. Tired of walking into KvK blind. Tired of guessing.
about.originP2: So he built the tool he wished existed: a place where every kingdom's track record is laid bare. Real data. Real results. No spin.
about.originP3: Today, Atlas is powered by the community‚Äîplayers contributing data, reporting results, and helping each other make smarter decisions. This isn't a corporate product. It's a passion project built by someone who plays the game and wants to see the community thrive.
about.finePrintDesc: Our data comes from community contributions and verified KvK results. We obsess over accuracy, but KvK is complex‚Äîedge cases exist. If you spot an error, let us know.
about.cosmosCredit: for compiling the original KvK History spreadsheet that made this project possible. Community effort at its finest.
about.disclaimer: Kingshot Atlas is an independent fan project. We're not affiliated with or endorsed by the developers of Kingshot. We're just players who love the game.
about.trademarkNotice: Kingshot is a trademark of Century Games. All game content and materials are trademarks and copyrights of Century Games and its licensors. Kingshot Atlas is not affiliated with, endorsed, sponsored, or approved by Century Games. All KvK data on this platform is community-sourced and user-submitted.
about.transferHubDesc2: puts real data behind the biggest decision in Kingshot.
about.forPlayersDesc: Browse every kingdom with Atlas Scores, KvK records, and community reviews. Create a Transfer Profile, apply directly, and track your applications. Match Scores show which kingdoms fit your playstyle.
about.forRecruitersDesc: Claim your kingdom, set up your listing with requirements and vibe tags, and review incoming applications. Fund your listing to unlock better visibility and features like invites and priority placement.
about.transferHubCTA: Real data. Real applications. No more guessing who's actually recruiting and who's worth joining.
about.fuelDesc: Servers cost money. Development takes time. If Atlas has helped you make better decisions, consider throwing some support our way. Every bit helps keep the lights on and new features coming.
about.fuelFooter: Buy us a coffee, fund a feature, or just say thanks ‚òï
about.joinCommunityDesc: Got intel to share? Found a bug? Want to argue about tier rankings? Jump into our Discord. We're always looking for contributors, testers, and fellow data nerds.

guide.title: How the Transfer Hub Works
guide.intro: No more blind transfers. Here's everything you need in 60 seconds.
guide.tipRecruit: The better your Transfer Profile, the higher your Match Score with kingdoms. Fill it out completely ‚Äî recruiters notice.
guide.tipRecruiter: Kingdoms with active funds rank higher in listings. Even a Bronze tier gets you noticed over Standard listings.

recruit.step1Desc: Select "I'm Transferring" from the toggle at the top. This unlocks tools built for you.
recruit.step2Desc: Set your power, TC level, language, and what you're looking for. Kingdoms see this when you apply.
recruit.step3Desc: Every kingdom has an Atlas Score, KvK record, and community reviews. Use filters to narrow it down. Match Scores show how well you fit.
recruit.step4Desc: Found the right one? Hit Apply. You can have up to 3 active applications. Track their status in My Applications.

recruiter.step1Desc: Switch to "I'm Recruiting" and claim editor rights. You need endorsements from kingdom members to activate.
recruiter.step2Desc: Open the Recruiter Dashboard. Add your pitch, requirements, languages, vibe tags, and event times. This is your kingdom's storefront.
recruiter.step3Desc: Contributing to your Kingdom Fund unlocks Bronze ‚Üí Silver ‚Üí Gold tiers with better visibility and features. Funds deplete ~$5/week.
recruiter.step4Desc: Applicants land in your inbox. View their profiles, mark as Interested, Accept, or Decline. The right players come to you.

transferHubLanding.pageTitle: Transfer Hub ‚Äî Find Your Next Kingdom
transferHubLanding.heroSubtitle: Stop asking around in Discord. Find the right kingdom ‚Äî or the right players ‚Äî with real data. 100% free.
transferHubLanding.freeNote: Free for all players. Link your Kingshot account to get started.
transferHubLanding.threeSteps: Three steps. Whether you're moving or recruiting.
transferHubLanding.step1Desc: Sign in and link your Kingshot Player ID. Takes 30 seconds.
transferHubLanding.step2Desc: Transferring? Browse listings. Recruiting? Claim your kingdom and set up your page.
transferHubLanding.step3Desc: Apply to kingdoms, review applications, and make moves ‚Äî all backed by real data.
transferHubLanding.forPlayersSubtitle: Find where you belong ‚Äî backed by data, not rumors.
transferHubLanding.tfFeat1Desc: See which kingdoms are actively recruiting ‚Äî with Atlas Scores, KvK records, and community reviews. No more guessing.
transferHubLanding.tfFeat2Desc: List your stats, playstyle, and what you're looking for. Recruiters find you ‚Äî no cold-calling required.
transferHubLanding.tfFeat3Desc: Every kingdom gets a match percentage based on your profile. Sort by best fit, apply to your top picks, and track your applications.
transferHubLanding.forRecruitersSubtitle: Stop cold-calling in transfer chat. Let the right players come to you.
transferHubLanding.rcFeat1Desc: Claim your kingdom, set requirements, add vibe tags, and describe what makes your kingdom worth joining. Your listing is always live.
transferHubLanding.rcFeat2Desc: Qualified players apply directly. Review their profiles, stats, and playstyle ‚Äî then accept or pass. No more spamming transfer chat.
transferHubLanding.rcFeat3Desc: Optionally deposit into your kingdom's fund to unlock priority placement, invite features, and a premium badge. Anyone in your kingdom can contribute.
transferHubLanding.fundDesc: Recruiting is a team effort. Anyone in your kingdom can chip in to boost the listing. Funds deplete slowly over time, so active kingdoms stay on top.
transferHubLanding.standardPerk1: Basic listing with Atlas Score & stats
transferHubLanding.fundNote: Depositing is 100% optional. The Transfer Hub is free for everyone. Fund tiers just give your kingdom extra visibility.
transferHubLanding.fundTeamwork: Ask your alliance to chip in ‚Äî recruiting benefits everyone in the kingdom.
transferHubLanding.problemTitle: Transfer chat is a mess. You know it.
transferHubLanding.problemDesc: Hundreds of messages. Half of them aren't serious. No way to compare kingdoms side by side. No way to know which recruiters are legit. You end up asking in Discord and getting 20 different opinions.
transferHubLanding.solutionDesc: The Transfer Hub replaces all of that. Every recruiting kingdom has real stats, an Atlas Score, KvK history, and community reviews. Players create profiles with their own stats and preferences. Apply directly. Track your applications. Done.
transferHubLanding.punchline: Real data. Real applications. No more blind migrations.
transferHubLanding.discordDesc: Every Transfer Event, we open dedicated Discord channels for each kingdom group. Link your account, get auto-assigned to your group, and start coordinating with players in your range ‚Äî before the event even starts.
transferHubLanding.discordStep3: Chat with players in your kingdom range
transferHubLanding.discordWhy: The Transfer Hub gives you the data. Discord gives you the conversation. Use both to land in the right kingdom.
transferHubLanding.ctaDesc: Whether you're looking for a new home or looking for strong players ‚Äî the Transfer Hub connects you with the right match. No cost, no catch.
transferHubLanding.cmpBadge: Gilded badge for all kingdom users
transferHubLanding.cmpBasicListing: Basic listing with Atlas Score & stats
transferHubLanding.fundSubtitle: Recruiting is a team effort. Anyone in your kingdom can chip in to boost the listing.

prepLanding.featAutoAssignDesc: Players submit their availability and speedups. The system auto-assigns 30-minute buff slots based on who brings the most value. No spreadsheets, no guesswork.
prepLanding.featSpeedupsDesc: The algorithm prioritizes players with the highest relevant speedups for each day's buff type ‚Äî Construction, Research, or Training. Every minute counts.
prepLanding.featExportDesc: Export the full 3-day schedule as a CSV. Player names, alliances, slot times, and speedup data ‚Äî ready for Discord or in-game chat.
prepLanding.featProofDesc: Players upload a screenshot of their speedup inventory when submitting. Managers can verify claims before assigning slots. Trust, but verify.
prepLanding.featShareLinkDesc: Share one link with your kingdom. Players see only the submission form ‚Äî clean, simple, no confusion. They fill it out, you manage the schedule.
prepLanding.featConflictDesc: Unassigned players are flagged instantly. Availability gaps are highlighted. The manager sees exactly where the schedule needs attention ‚Äî no one gets lost.
prepLanding.step1Desc: An Editor, Co-Editor, or Prep Manager creates a Prep Schedule for their Silver+ Tier kingdom and sets an optional submission deadline.
prepLanding.step2Desc: Share the form link with kingdom players. They submit their speedups, availability, and proof screenshots.
prepLanding.step3Desc: One click auto-assigns optimal slots. Review, adjust if needed, then export the schedule and share it with your kingdom.
prepLanding.heroSubtitle: Your Silver+ Tier kingdom earned elite tools. Stop losing Prep Phase points to disorganized buff scheduling ‚Äî Atlas turns chaos into a precision-timed machine that maximizes every 30-minute slot.
prepLanding.goldTierNote: Reach Gold Tier through the Kingdom Fund to unlock this and other premium kingdom tools.
prepLanding.silverPlusTierNote: Reach Silver Tier ($50+) through the Kingdom Fund to unlock this and other premium kingdom tools.
prepLanding.silverPlusTitle: Your kingdom deserves organized prep phases.
prepLanding.silverPlusDesc: The KvK Prep Scheduler is available to kingdoms with Silver Tier ($50+) or Gold Tier ($100+) status through the Kingdom Fund. If your kingdom isn't Silver Tier yet, encourage your alliance leaders to contribute.
prepLanding.ctaNote: Editors, Co-Editors, and Prep Managers of Silver+ Tier kingdoms can create and manage schedules.
prepLanding.featuresSubtitle: Every feature exists because managing prep phase scheduling was a nightmare. Until now.
prepLanding.problemTitle: Your kingdom has 200 players. 48 buff slots per day. Do the math.
prepLanding.problemP1: Right now, your Prep Manager is probably juggling a Google Sheet, a Discord thread that's 500 messages deep, and a headache. Players post their availability in different time zones. Nobody knows who has the best speedups. Half the slots go to people who don't even show up.
prepLanding.problemP2: The KvK Prep Scheduler collects everything in one form ‚Äî speedups, availability, proof screenshots ‚Äî with a submission deadline shown in 24-hour UTC (and your local time). Then it auto-assigns slots based on who brings the most value for each day's buff type. Construction Monday? The system knows who has the most construction speedups and puts them in the best slots. Research Tuesday? Same logic, different data.
prepLanding.problemP3: Unassigned players get flagged immediately. Empty time slots are highlighted. The manager sees exactly where the gaps are and can manually assign anyone into any slot with override.
prepLanding.punchline: That's not scheduling. That's strategic resource allocation.
prepLanding.whoEditorsDesc: Create schedules for their kingdom. Assign Prep Managers to run the process. Full control over the schedule lifecycle.
prepLanding.whoPrepManagersDesc: Assigned by Editors to run the day-to-day. Review submissions, auto-assign slots, export schedules, handle change requests.
prepLanding.whoPlayersDesc: Fill out the form. Submit speedups, availability, and proof. Get assigned a 30-minute slot. Show up and buff.
prepLanding.ctaDesc: Your kingdom's Prep Phase doesn't have to be chaos. The Scheduler turns it into a streamlined, data-driven process.
prepLanding.goldDesc: The Prep Scheduler is available for Silver+ Tier kingdoms.
prepLanding.whoManagersDesc: Assigned by Editors to run the day-to-day. Review submissions, auto-assign slots, export schedules, handle change requests.

baseDesigner.heroSubtitle: Your alliance base is a fortress ‚Äî or a liability. Plan the layout before a single flag drops. No more "just put your city anywhere."
baseDesigner.accessConfirm: You have access to the Alliance Base Designer.
baseDesigner.accessNote: Available for Atlas Supporters, Ambassadors, and Discord Server Boosters.
baseDesigner.gateDesc: This tool is available to Atlas Supporters, Ambassadors, and Discord Server Boosters. Support Atlas to unlock powerful alliance management tools.
baseDesigner.step1Desc: Enter the coordinate range of your alliance base. Focus the map on your area.
baseDesigner.step2Desc: Select building types and click to place them on the grid. Drag to reposition. Label cities with player names.
baseDesigner.step3Desc: Screenshot or save your design. Share it with R4/R5 leadership to coordinate the alliance base layout.
baseDesigner.featuresSubtitle: Every feature exists because R4/R5 leaders asked for it.
baseDesigner.featGridDesc: A full 1200√ó1200 isometric grid that mirrors the in-game alliance territory. Zoom, pan, and navigate just like the real map.
baseDesigner.featBuildingsDesc: Place cities, traps, flags, resource points, and alliance buildings. Each type has its correct footprint ‚Äî no guesswork.
baseDesigner.featLabelsDesc: Assign player names to city blocks and time slots to traps. Everyone knows exactly where they belong.
baseDesigner.featSaveDesc: Your layout auto-saves to your browser. Refresh the page, come back tomorrow ‚Äî your design is still there. Save multiple designs too.
baseDesigner.featBoundsDesc: Set coordinate bounds to highlight your alliance territory. Focus the view instantly on the area that matters.
baseDesigner.featShortcutsDesc: Full keyboard shortcuts for undo, redo, delete, and navigation. Smooth trackpad panning and pinch-to-zoom on desktop.
baseDesigner.problemTitle: "Just put your city near the flag." That's not a strategy.
baseDesigner.problemDesc: Players too far from the bear traps. Cities scattered in dead zones where reinforcements can't reach them in time. Without a layout tool, you're stuck with spreadsheets, hand-drawn maps, or just hoping everyone figures it out. R4s spend hours directing teleports one by one ‚Äî and between language barriers and players who keep landing on the wrong tile, half the work gets undone the moment someone moves.
baseDesigner.solutionDesc: The Alliance Base Designer lets you plan the entire layout before anyone moves. Place every city, every trap, every building on the exact coordinates. Label each block with the player's name. Share the screenshot. Everyone knows exactly where to go. Need to adjust? It's drag and drop ‚Äî rearrange the whole base in minutes, not hours.
baseDesigner.punchline: That's not planning. That's an architectural masterclass.
baseDesigner.accessThanks: You have full access to the Base Designer.
baseDesigner.accessThanksDesc: Jump into the designer and start planning your alliance fortress.
baseDesigner.accessTitle: Your alliance deserves a real battle plan.
baseDesigner.accessDesc: The Alliance Base Designer is available for Atlas Supporters, Ambassadors, and Discord Server Boosters. Become a Supporter to unlock this and other premium tools.
baseDesigner.territoryPrompt: Define your alliance territory by placing Banners or HQ. Cities, Traps, and Special buildings can only be placed within territory zones (shown in green).

battleRegistryLanding.heroSubtitle: The difference between winning a castle battle and losing one? Knowing exactly who's showing up ‚Äî and what they're bringing.
battleRegistryLanding.accessConfirm: You have full access as a Gold/Silver Tier kingdom member.
battleRegistryLanding.goldPerk: Available for Gold & Silver Tier kingdoms. Contribute to the Kingdom Fund to unlock.
battleRegistryLanding.step1Desc: Editors or Battle Managers create a registry for the upcoming KvK Castle Battle.
battleRegistryLanding.step2Desc: Share the link. Players fill out their time slot, troop tiers, and truegold levels in 30 seconds.
battleRegistryLanding.step3Desc: Use the dashboard to see who's available, what they're bringing, and plan your castle hit accordingly.
battleRegistryLanding.featuresSubtitle: Every feature exists because R4s and R5s asked for it.
battleRegistryLanding.featTimeDesc: Players pick their availability between 12:00‚Äì18:00 UTC. Instantly see how many warriors you have at each hour. No more guessing who's online.
battleRegistryLanding.featTroopsDesc: Every player reports their Infantry, Cavalry, and Archer Tier (T1‚ÄìT11) and Truegold Level (TG1‚ÄìTG8). Know your kingdom's true military strength.
battleRegistryLanding.featDashboardDesc: Real-time summary of player availability and troop distribution. See your army composition at a glance ‚Äî tier spread, truegold levels, alliance breakdown.
battleRegistryLanding.featAllianceDesc: See exactly how many players each alliance is contributing. Hold everyone accountable. Reward the alliances that show up.
battleRegistryLanding.featShareDesc: Share a single link with your kingdom. Players fill a 30-second form. Username and alliance auto-fill. Zero friction, maximum intel.
battleRegistryLanding.featAccessDesc: Only your kingdom's players can register. Editors, Co-Editors, and Battle Managers control the registry. Your data stays yours.
battleRegistryLanding.problemTitle: "How many people do we have for castle?" ‚Äî Every R5, every KvK.
battleRegistryLanding.problemDesc: You post in kingdom chat. Half the alliances don't reply. You get a rough count an hour before the battle. Some people show up with T5 infantry when you needed T11 cavalry. The castle falls because you didn't know what you had.
battleRegistryLanding.solutionDesc: The Battle Registry collects every player's availability and troop levels in one place. You see exactly who can be online at 14:00 UTC, how many T11 cavalry your kingdom has, and which alliances are pulling their weight. Plan the battle with data ‚Äî not hope.
battleRegistryLanding.punchline: Information wins wars. Guessing loses them.
battleRegistryLanding.accessThanks: You have full access to the Battle Registry.
battleRegistryLanding.accessThanksDesc: Your kingdom has earned access. Create a registry and start collecting player intel for your next castle battle.
battleRegistryLanding.goldTitle: Give your kingdom the intel advantage.
battleRegistryLanding.goldDesc: The Battle Registry is available for Gold and Silver Tier kingdoms. Help your kingdom reach the tier by contributing to the Kingdom Fund.
